comment: Utsav, former Gab employee, relinquished his Gab shares for five cents each. Gab wants you to pay $4.00 each. Don't pay X what the best informed insider was willing to take for his.
amr:
# ::snt Utsav, former Gab employee, relinquished his Gab shares for five cents each. Gab wants you to pay $4.00 each. Don't pay X what the best informed insider was willing to take for his.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / relinquish-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Utsav")
                  :ARG1-of (e / employ-01
                        :ARG0 (c / company
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Gab"))
                        :time (f / former)))
            :ARG1 (s / share
                  :mod c
                  :poss p)
            :ARG3 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                  :quant 5
                  :unit (c2 / cent)
                  :mod (e2 / each)))
      :snt2 (w / want-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (p2 / pay-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant 4.00
                        :unit (d / dollar)
                        :mod (e3 / each))))
      :snt3 (p3 / pay-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (t / thing
                  :ARG1-of (t2 / take-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / insider
                              :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                                    :ARG2 (ii2 / inform-01
                                          :ARG1 ii)
                                    :ARG3 (m4 / most)))
                        :ARG2 (h2 / he)
                        :ARG1-of (w2 / will-02
                              :ARG0 ii)))
            :ARG2 y))

# ::snt Who was Utsav?
(p / person
      :name (n / name
            :op1 "Utsav")
      :domain (a / amr-unknown))

comment: That too and she worked for Mossad.

            :ARG2 (o / organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Mossad"))))

comment: If he owns his own company, he had to have been doing something right.
amr:

(o / obligate-01
      :ARG1 (h / he)
      :ARG2 (d / do-02
            :ARG0 h
            :ARG1 (s / something)
            :ARG2-of (r / right-06
                  :ARG1 h))
      :condition (o2 / own-01
            :ARG0 h
            :ARG1 (c / company
                  :poss h)))

comment: Please frame your thoughts in a way that is expressing encouragement and not hate.
amr:
# ::snt Please frame your thoughts in a way that is expressing encouragement and not hate.
(f / frame-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (t2 / think-01
                  :ARG0 y))
      :manner (w / way
            :mod (e / express-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (e2 / encourage-01
                              :ARG0 y)
                        :op2 (h / hate-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 y)))))
